description: Try our easy to follow Mango Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mango Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat remaining cream until soft peaks form. Top cheesecake with whipped cream and sliced mango, and sprinkle over zest to serve.
